titlealts.searchtitle: Data Element: TIME BETWEEN DELIVERY AND UMBILICAL CORD CLAMPING - Description

div.p: TIME BETWEEN DELIVERY AND UMBILICAL CORD CLAMPING is the amount of time in seconds between the delivery of a baby and the Patient Procedure to clamp the umbilical cord.
For the National Neonatal Data Set - Episodic and Daily Care, this is measured in seconds. The value is in the range of 0 - 3600.
